content: luma final piece should measure approximately 3 tall difficulty easy this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2017 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern luma belongs to nintendo materials key ▪ dk weight yarn in yellow dark grey white ▪ chain = chain ▪ c hook 2 75 mm ▪ single_crochet = single_crochet ▪ stuffing ▪ increase = increase ▪ scissors ▪ decrease = decrease ▪ tapestry needle ▪ f/o = finish off ▪ = repeat ▪ = total number of stitches per row/ round © icrochetthings 2017 body starting with yellow 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4 2 single_crochet increase around 24 5 3 single_crochet increase around 30 6 4 single_crochet increase around 36 7 12 single_crochet around 36 13 4 single_crochet decrease around 30 14 single_crochet around 30 15 3 single_crochet decrease around 24 16 single_crochet around 24 17 2 single_crochet decrease around 18 18 19 single_crochet around 18 stuff 20 single_crochet decrease around 12 21 single_crochet around 12 22 2 single_crochet decrease around 9 23 turn 5 single_crochet 5 24 turn 5 single_crochet single_crochet into the unused stitches of round 22 9 25 single_crochet around 9 stuff 26 single_crochet decrease around 6 27 single_crochet around 6 f/o sew shut © icrochetthings 2017 2 legs starting with yellow 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet around 9 4 2 single_crochet increase around 12 5 single_crochet around 12 6 turn 6 single_crochet 6 f/o leave long tail for sewing 2 arms starting with yellow 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet in 1st chain 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet around 9 4 2 single_crochet increase around 12 5 single_crochet around 12 f/o leave long tail for sewing © icrochetthings 2017 assembly see pictures on next page if you need help with placement ▪ sew the arms on either side of the body stuffing as you go ▪ sew the legs onto the bottom of the body stuffing as you go ▪ use dark grey yarn to embroider eyes onto the body ▪ use white yarn to embroider shines onto the eyes © icrochetthings 2017 © icrochetthings 2017
